metadata.description: Audio separation with SAM Audio. Isolate any sound using natural languageâ€”professional-grade audio editing made simple for creators, researchers, and accessibility applications.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/sam-audio/visual-separate
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/sam-audio/visual-separate queue.

prompt.description: Text prompt to assist with separation. Use natural language to describe the target sound.
prompt.title: Prompt

video_url.description: URL of the video file to process (MP4, MOV, etc.)
video_url.title: Video Url

mask_video_url.description: URL of the mask video (binary mask indicating target object). Black=target, White=background.
mask_video_url.title: Mask Video Url

reranking_candidates.description: Number of candidates to generate and rank. Higher improves quality but increases latency and cost.
reranking_candidates.title: Reranking Candidates

duration.description: Duration of the output audio in seconds.
duration.title: Duration

sample_rate.description: Sample rate of the output audio in Hz.
sample_rate.title: Sample Rate

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Generate synced sounds for any video, and return the new sound track (like MMAudio)

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for mirelo-ai/sfx-v1.5/video-to-audio
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the mirelo-ai/sfx-v1.5/video-to-audio queue.

num_samples.title: Num Samples
num_samples.description: The number of samples to generate from the model

duration.description: The duration of the generated audio in seconds
duration.title: Duration

start_offset.description: The start offset in seconds to start the audio generation from
start_offset.title: Start Offset

video_url.description: A video url that can accessed from the API to process and add sound effects
video_url.title: Video Url

seed.description: The seed to use for the generation. If not provided, a random seed will be used
seed.title: Seed

text_prompt.title: Text Prompt
text_prompt.description: Additional description to guide the model

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Generate audio from input videos using Kling

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/kling-video/video-to-audio
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/kling-video/video-to-audio queue.

video_url.title: Video Url
video_url.description: The video URL to extract audio from. Only .mp4/.mov formats are supported. File size does not exceed 100MB. Video duration between 3.0s and 20.0s.

asmr_mode.title: Asmr Mode
asmr_mode.description: Enable ASMR mode. This mode enhances detailed sound effects and is suitable for highly immersive content scenarios.

background_music_prompt.title: Background Music Prompt
background_music_prompt.description: Background music prompt. Cannot exceed 200 characters.

sound_effect_prompt.title: Sound Effect Prompt
sound_effect_prompt.description: Sound effect prompt. Cannot exceed 200 characters.
sound_effect_prompt.default: Car tires screech as they accelerate in a drag race

audio.title: Audio
audio.description: The extracted/generated audio from the video in MP3 format

video.title: Video
video.description: The original video with dubbed audio applied

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.
